item.title: Hugo
item.description: Some curated list of bookmarks related to hugo. Themes hermit https://www.petersheim.net first time this theme was seen https://nicke.io/ dark version https://nayak.io/ light version https://jimmysong.io/ clean white https://leaanthony.com/ clean white, navigation bar at the top https://linuxwind.com/ another clean white version https://milad.dev clean blog structure also check his books list https://daryl.
